synopsis.text: In a single mysterious night, unexplained events rock the nine provinces. Five years later, Chu Feng, an unremarkable disciple at the Azure Dragon School, makes a shocking discovery - one of the mythical lightning beasts has been sealed within him. This awakening sparks Chu Feng's epic journey of cultivation and his rise from obscurity. Though initially viewed as ungifted, Chu Feng embarks on a path that defies expectations. By enlightening himself without a master, he learns powerful skills and techniques. With an indomitable army of spirit warriors at his side, Chu Feng gradually unveils his strength. In time, the world comes to know him as Asura, the peerless Martial God. But true comprehension of his identity remains beyond Chu Feng. His ascent has only just begun.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
